pages.text: Morganucodon is an early mammaliaform that lived from the Late Triassic to Jurassic periods. it resembled a rat in appearance but unlike other early mammaliaforms, Morganucodon was found to be more well preserved and abundant. Morganucodon was likely a nocturnal burrower, spending the day inside its burrow to avoid the larger dinosaurs that it coexisted with in the Jurassic.
